amendment.description: Amendment sought to preserve the First Amendment Right to Petition.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 113-271 to preserve the First Amendment Right to Petition.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 222 (Roll no. 594).
